name: Folks
greetingText: I really like your team btw!
wishText: I sincerely hope to work with you.
text1: Thanks for visiting my working example.
textInChatBox: This is my working example of React Green Sock Animation Platform.
text2: I can work with full time.
text3: I will work remotely 40hr+ in a week.
text4: I can start immediately when from I get hired.
text5Content: I am an experienced React.js developer.
wishHeading: I am sure that I am the best candidate for this position.
outroText: I am ready to start right now.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
